name: .LMX File Extension
summary: Learn about .LMX files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Data file that contains descriptive information about landmarks; contains the name, description, coordinates, address, and category of each landmark; saved in a standard XML format.

content: LMX files can be imported by the mapping application included with Nokia phones. They are supported by Nokia Symbian-based devices, such as S60 mobile phones.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
